title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly outline the project's goals, features, and user requirements for the NeuroFeedbackMeditationAssistant device.

title: Design User Interface Wireframes
description: Create wireframes for the user interface of the NeuroFeedbackMeditationAssistant device, including layout and interaction design.

title: Select Suitable Hardware Components
description: Research and select appropriate hardware components (e.g., EEG sensors, microcontrollers) for the NeuroFeedbackMeditationAssistant device.

title: Develop Neurofeedback Algorithm
description: Design and implement an algorithm to analyze EEG data in real-time for providing neurofeedback during meditation.

title: Integrate User Interface with Backend System
description: Connect the frontend user interface with the backend system for seamless data exchange and neurofeedback display.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure data privacy and security by implementing encryption, authentication, and other security measures.
dependencies: Integrate User Interface with Backend System

title: Conduct Device Testing
description: Test the NeuroFeedbackMeditationAssistant device for functionality, usability, and performance.
dependencies: Integrate User Interface with Backend System

title: Document Project Design and Implementation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the project design, architecture, and implementation details.
dependencies: Integrate User Interface with Backend System
